content: Freelance writing, as you describe it, Mateja, can only be a hobby, an avocation. There’s no way to earn a living. Perhaps it’s a mode of marketing: you get your best stuff out there and eventually it leads to a decent form of monetization. Consulting or speaking or teaching. Or podcasts. Or online products. Or people buy your book. When it has worked for me, it has been a combo of all these things. I wonder if there are any stats on how much any Medium writers are making, and from what.
